column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I will change this country ’s self-image from that of THE SUPER POWER/ WORLD
#Text=LEADER to that of a member of the global community .
#Text=I will cut our military budget by at least half .
#Text=We need to stop supporting dictators .
#Text=On the nuclear issue , we need to get rid of double standards .
#Text=We need to treat all nations with the same expectations , be it Pakistan , Israel , France , the U.S. , Iran , etc.
#Text=In other words , my policies would be even-handed .
#Text=I will join the rest of the world in pressuring Israel to live up to treaties , and to dismantle its nuclear arms .
#Text=I will use the “ special relationship ” between Israel and the U.S. to motivate Israel to do this .
#Text=I will work for the global shutting down of all nuclear reactors and dismantling of all nuclear [ and biological and chemical ] weapons .
#Text=I will start this in the U.S. All countries should be expected to live under the same rules … . not one set for the “ super powers ” and another for the “ developing ” nations like Iran .
#Text=I will push for a global development of clean , safe energy sources as alternatives to nuclear power .
#Text=We have been robbed during the recent years of many of our rights and freedoms .
#Text=I will have repealing parties in the White House , scrapping all the rules and policies in every department and agency that infringe on our rights , freedoms , privacy , health and welfare .
#Text=We will have similar parties in both houses of Congress to repeal bad laws such as the so-called Patriot Act .
#Text=We will return to the common English language in which “ torture ” means torture .
#Text=I will declassify documents that were classified to hide questionable actions rather than to protect the real national interests .
#Text=I will push the Justice Department to investigate the war on The Left by the F.B.I. since the 60 ’s .
#Text=Terrorism is a criminal matter .
#Text=It should be dealt with as such , not as a war .
#Text=We should n’t abandon our principles , freedoms , rights , The Constitution and The Bills of Rights to live in fear .
#Text=Whenever there is an attempt to fudge the limits of power for convenience of “ safety , ” we the people get screwed .
#Text=I ’ll do away with welfare , medicare and social security .
#Text=Instead , every American will receive a minimum income of $ 1,000 a month .
#Text=This amount will be tied to the cost of living and will not be taxable .
#Text=We will have universal prenatal-to-the-grave health care and universal free education with equal access .
#Text=The universal health care would include all medicine , medical equipment and supplies , long-term care , personal attendants , etc.
#Text=There will be no pre-authorization ritual .
#Text=So your doctor will be free to prescribe whatever you need .
#Text=There may be a review of treatment afterward if there are any questions .
#Text=Everybody will have the same care as the President now has .
#Text=Preventative medicine will be stressed and the so-called alternative medicine will be included .
#Text=You will notice that health insurance companies are not in this picture !
